T02D2591:1b-0: @1b # // byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa /
T02D2591:1b-1: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2591:1b-2: bdag mang gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings [dd] sku brnyes pa //
T02D2591:1b-3: kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la gsal zhing bla med lam mchog ste //
T02D2591:1b-4: mi ldog sa la sogs te dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa //
T02D2591:1b-5: gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos //
T02D2591:1b-6: ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags pa //
T02D2591:1b-7: chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu snying po nyid //
T02D2591:1b-8: bde gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pas rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go //
T02D2591:1b-9: tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa rgya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa //
T02D2591:1b-10: rnam dag byang chub sems kyi ngang tshul bsgoms dang yon tan khyad par ni //
T02D2591:1b-11: blo ldan nam zhig sems kyi dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na //
T02D2591:1b-12: de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur par chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2591:2a-0: shes byed dam par gyur pa shes rab @2a * //
T02D2591:2a-1: spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya //
T02D2591:2a-2: rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do //
T02D2591:2a-3: ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su bsnyad pa de dag thams cad kyang //
T02D2591:2a-4: byang chub sems nyid rdzogs pas de yi yon tan de dag de las byung //
T02D2591:2a-5: 'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang //
T02D2591:2a-6: de med mi 'byung de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do //
T02D2591:2a-7: de nas kun du [*kun tu?] rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur //
T02D2591:2a-8: pha zhing shes dka' drang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog las 'das //
T02D2591:2a-9: brtag par dka' zhing ba stan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral //
T02D2591:2a-10: tshig gis mi phebs gzhan dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang //
T02D2591:2a-11: ston pa nges pa'i lung dang bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag de nyid don 'dir blta //
T02D2591:2a-12: mngon sum la sogs rgyu yi dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' dpyod pa //
T02D2591:2a-13: de nyid rtog pa'i rgyun 'brangs dpyod yul tshad mar bzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de //
T02D2591:2a-14: rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod mtha' med de snying po med na tshad mar gang //
T02D2591:2b-0: de phyir 'jig rten brtags pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos @2b so ;
T02D2591:2b-1: ; dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya //
T02D2591:2b-2: skye bo kun gyi sems la mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni //
T02D2591:2b-3: 'dzin pa drug gi ji ltar mthong zhing brtags pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul //
T02D2591:2b-4: rang gi rtog pas myos shing gzung ba de bzhin bden gyur na //
T02D2591:2b-5: de dag dngos po med rtogs dgra bcom 'dra bar grol 'gyur pa yi rigs //
T02D2591:2b-6: de dag dus dgras 'joms dang sdug bsngal nyen las des 'khrul mngon par 'gyur //
T02D2591:2b-7: gzhan du skye mched sgo nas rig pa de dag tshad mar gyur na ni //
T02D2591:2b-8: de nyid tshad mar gyur pas 'phags pa'i lam de su la dgos mi 'gyur //
T02D2591:2b-9: lam de rnam grol lam du ba stan cing dbang po'i shes pas mi thar te //
T02D2591:2b-10: sdug bsngal 'ga' yang mi 'jil rnam rig shes te nyon mongs 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D2591:2b-11: de phyir skye bos mthong ba de dag 'khrul par mngon zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2591:2b-12: de na de las 'di dag 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar snang bar 'gyur zhe na ;
T02D2591:2b-13: / kun du [*kun tu?] rtog can yan lag ma
T02D2591:2b-14: yin kun du [*kun tu?] rtog pas rtsol med nyams
T02D2591:2b-15: // blo gros phyin ci log tu gyur cing ma rig rkyen gyi dbang song bas //
T02D2591:2b-16: sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid lus gsum don du snang ba yin //
T02D2591:2b-17: 'du byed sna tshogs dag gis bag chags bsags las gang goms mthu brtas tshe //
T02D2591:2b-18: sems nyid yul dang lus 'drar snang ba rus bas gang ba bzhin du snang //
T02D2591:2b-19: bag chags bsags pa'i rgyun la dmigs skyes yid la brtags pa'i bdag med pa //
T02D2591:2b-20: 'du byed mthu yis bsgribs shing phra ba ma mthong de las rnam rig skye //
T02D2591:2b-21: rgyun dang bcas pa'i sems kyi mthu ni ma rtogs rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D2591:2b-22: de las zag bcas rang bzhin rtog pas bdag dang chos rnams rgyas par byed //
T02D2591:2b-23: ldan par 'byung ba shin tu phra bar rgyu ba de ni ma mthong las //
T02D2591:2b-24: bdag tu lta la sogs pa mu stegs lta ba
T02D2591:2b-25: sna tshogs skye zhing thar pa rtog / sems 'di
T02D2591:2b-26: las rnams mtha' yas gnas gyur bag chags mtha' med
T02D2591:2b-27: nges pa med // bag chags brtas shing sad par byed pa'i rkyen yang rnam pa sna tshogs te //
T02D2591:2b-28: rkyen 'gas bag chags 'ga' zhig smin nas mi yi rgyud kyi lus snang ba //
T02D2591:2b-29: rkyen gzhan dag gis bag chags gzhan sad byas tshe 'gyur ba'i mthu mthong nas //
T02D2591:3a-1: sogs byed par 'dod de nyes pa lam de mi zhi grol mi 'gyur //
T02D2591:3a-2: rnal 'byor lam slad the tshom rgyun 'di phra ba ma rtogs skyes //
T02D2591:3a-3: bdag tu brtags bas bsgribs te 'phags pa'i rigs dang rnam par bral //
T02D2591:3a-4: chos su btags pas sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'byung zhing ngan song srid par 'gyur //
T02D2591:3a-5: rnam shes de yang 'du byed rgyun la mtshan ma tha dad 'dzin pas na //
T02D2591:3a-6: las kyi khyad par dag gis brgyang du snang gi rigs la tha dad med //
T02D2591:3a-7: de phyir sems kyi skad cig dang po de la lus dang chos kun gnas //
T02D2591:3a-8: de la bsam pa zhen pa'i phyir na phyi ma phyi ma de la snang //
T02D2591:3a-9: rang sems rgyun las 'phags pa skye bo chos ni gzhan na yod ma yin //
T02D2591:3a-10: rgyud drug rigs las de yang sna tshogs de dang rang gi ting 'dzin no //
T02D2591:3a-11: sems rgyun de las phyogs kyang cung zad med pas gcig la brten med de //
T02D2591:3a-12: de la phyogs med phyir na mtha' yas zhing rnams bdag gi lus //
T02D2591:3a-13: bdag gi lus ni mtha' yas zhing dang skye bo'i lus su rab snang yang //
T02D2591:3a-14: sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad ma yin brtag par rab tu dka' //
T02D2591:3a-15: 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung tshul te skye dang 'gag par 'gyur zhes pa //
T02D2591:3a-16: tshig pa'i sa bon bzhin du med las med pa mi 'byung rgyu 'bras med //
T02D2591:3a-17: dngos por zhen cing rgyu dang 'bras bur rtog pa'i sems nyid ni //
T02D2591:3a-18: rgyu dang rkyen du snang ste de gnyis med phyir skye dang 'jig pa med //
T02D2591:3a-19: skye 'jig med phyir bdag gzhan med de 'chi 'pho med phyir rtag chad med //
T02D2591:3a-20: des na 'khrul 'khor med cing mya ngan 'das pa med pa nyid du mngon //
T02D2591:3a-21: gnas kyi skad cig nam yang mi 'bras de tshe mnyam 'gyur de med med //
T02D2591:3a-22: yang dag ma yin rtog pas bskyed phyir bag chags yod pa ma yin dang //
T02D2591:3a-23: spyod yul med phyir kun gzhi med cing rnam rig de yang med pa bzhin //
T02D2591:3a-24: phyogs rnams med cing dmigs dang gnas med rnam par rig pa ji ltar skye //
T02D2591:3a-25: de phyir sems 'di yod med mtha' las 'das shing gcig dang du mar bral //
T02D2591:3a-26: bde gshegs byang chub med phyir de yi rdzu 'phrul sgyu 'dra 'khrul la snang //
T02D2591:3a-27: de bzhin dag pa'i ye shes de dag shin tu dge ba'i rgyun nyid dang //
T02D2591:3a-28: chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni de dag dmigs shing skye bar brtags pa yang //
T02D2591:3b-0: rdo rje'i gnas med phyir na @3b mnyam gnas rang bzhin 'drar 'gyur dang //
T02D2591:3b-1: chos dbyings rdo rje rtse mo de dag phyogs nyid med pas skad cig min //
T02D2591:3b-2: dag pa'i dge rtsa gzugs brnyan med pas 'jig rten ye shes yod mi 'gyur //
T02D2591:3b-3: de phyir byang chub ma chub mtshan nyid med par gcig pas blang dor med //
T02D2591:3b-4: don de'i tshul gyis don dam rnam grangs skye 'gag med dang mnyam nyid dang //
T02D2591:3b-5: gnyis med bsam 'das chos dbyings brjod dang tha snyad bral la sogs //
T02D2591:3b-6: ba stan pa de kun tha snyad yin te don dam med cing kun sgrib med //
T02D2591:3b-7: don dam tshul gyi lam 'dra zhes pa de nyid kun sgrib yin //
T02D2591:3b-8: the tshom yod med chos ni gang la 'ang spong zhing gnas par mi byed do //
T02D2591:3b-9: sgom pa dang ni chos dbyings med phyir som nyi med la dam par blta ba la yang med //
T02D2591:3b-10: de ltar dngos po mtha' rnams rtag dang rang bzhin sgyu ma 'ang med gyur phyir //
T02D2591:3b-11: yod la ltos pa'i med pa 'ang med de med pa'ang med //
T02D2591:3b-12: mtha' rnams med phyir dbus med dbus la 'ang gnas par mi byed la //
T02D2591:3b-13: gang la 'jig rten dbang phyug padma kun kyang mi spong 'drar mnyam gnas //
T02D2591:3b-14: chos la 'khrul par mthong ba de nyid 'khrul pa yin par rab rtogs te //
T02D2591:3b-15: drug gis ba stan pa bdud kyi las kyang mi 'dor ngan du mi rtog go //
T02D2591:3b-16: shes rab thabs kyi spyod la mi gnas phyir na bdud kyi 'dra par spyod //
T02D2591:3b-17: rang gi shes pa dam par byas pa kun las rgyal te de bsnyems nas //
T02D2591:3b-18: 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes nas rtsod 'byung gti mug yin te don mi mthong //
T02D2591:3b-19: ji srid yid kyi g-yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te phra ba'i lam //
T02D2591:3b-20: g-yo dang mi g-yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas pa la yang gnas par mi byed do //
T02D2591:3b-21: snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes bde gshegs gsungs //
T02D2591:3b-22: gzugs dang mtshan ma smon par 'dzin pa rab tu spangs nas ni //
T02D2591:3b-23: rnam thar gsum po bsgom pa'ang bdud kyi las te gzugs nying stong pa'o //
T02D2591:3b-24: 'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam bsgom pa'ang bdud nyid de //
T02D2591:3b-25: de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin brtsal spangs gar mi gnas //
T02D2591:3b-26: 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med //
T02D2591:3b-27: ldang dang mi ldang ched du mi spong sems rten mi 'cha' mngon du min //
T02D2591:4a-1: ma yin rdul tsam g-yo ba de yin der mi gnas //
T02D2591:4a-2: bsgom pa'i sa mi rnyed phyir bsgoms pas rnyed phrad mi 'gyur te //
T02D2591:4a-3: sems kyi spyod yul shes pa de dag chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid yin //
T02D2591:4a-4: rnam bral gang la mchog dang tha ma med par lam mchog 'di bsgom mo //
T02D2591:4a-5: 'du byed ma skyes chos kun 'byung med bzhin du chos rnams mya ngan 'das //
T02D2591:4a-6: dngos med de tshe kun kyang chos kyi dbyings zhes dgra bcom rab 'byor yin //
T02D2591:4a-7: nam mkha' mi dmigs ming tsam dge dang mi dger 'byed med skye ba 'ang med //
T02D2591:4a-8: rtsol ba yid la mi byed gang la 'ang sems med shes dang mi shes bral //
T02D2591:4a-9: dran dang 'byed med gang la 'ang 'ga' dang mtshungs med mi gnas mi dmigs shing //
T02D2591:4a-10: mnyam nas gnyis su brtag med brjod bral bya dang mi bya med de stsogs bri med //
T02D2591:4a-11: ched du rtsol bar yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang //
T02D2591:4a-12: gang la 'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing //
T02D2591:4a-13: mi 'phrogs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te //
T02D2591:4a-14: sems kyi dbyings su goms pas lam 'di gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2591:4a-15: brda can yang dag len pa 'ang byang chub chen po yin zhes ston pas rab gsungs phyir ;
T02D2591:4a-16: / de la 'di ni byang chub sems nyid bskyed cing bsgom pa'i gnas yin te //
T02D2591:4a-17: ting 'dzin gsum po ba stan par byas nas rtags kyi phyag rgya gsum bcings nas //
T02D2591:4a-18: chos kyi phyag rgya chen por sems nyid skyed de snying po brjod cing bsgom pa'i gnas //
T02D2591:4a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin //
T02D2591:4a-20: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po'i spyod pas ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung //
T02D2591:4a-21: kun du [*kun tu?] bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur //
T02D2591:4a-22: de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs //
T02D2591:4a-23: don 'dir mos pa de yang byang chub chen po yin zhes rgyal bas rab tu bsngags //
T02D2591:4a-24: gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa yis //
T02D2591:4a-25: mchod nas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes sangs rgyas gsungs //
T02D2591:4b-0: thabs chen byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di nyid @4b do ;
T02D2591:4b-1: /'di med rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do //
T02D2591:4b-2: skad cig tsam du dang pa'i shugs bskyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur //
T02D2591:4b-3: dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang gsungs pa yin //
T02D2591:4b-4: tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang srungs shing spyin gnas dam par rab tu bsngags //
T02D2591:4b-5: de phyir byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de la gzugs yod na //
T02D2591:4b-6: nam mkha' bar snang de yang snod du chugs zhes rgyal bas mtshungs par gsungs //
T02D2591:4b-7: skye bo skye ba sna tshogs dag las skyes shing skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyi dbang song ba //
T02D2591:4b-8: rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i
T02D2591:4b-9: rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur
T02D2591:4b-10: pa // sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag cing sgyu ma'i
T02D2591:4b-11: glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma
T02D2591:4b-12: pa // rnams // rmi lam gyis bslad bzhin du
T02D2591:4b-13: rmi lam bden pa nyams shing rmi lam dbang du
T02D2591:4b-15: lam 'di spong zhing mtha' dang lam gzhan lam du bltas nas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de //
T02D2591:4b-16: de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rjer rung zhing thugs rje'i thugs rjes kye ma 'bros pa yin //
T02D2591:4b-17: shin tu ma sbyangs dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la //
T02D2591:4b-18: gsung rab dri med rtogs dka' dag la sgra bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin min //
T02D2591:4b-19: rang gi blo gros stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs
T02D2591:4b-20: lta ba sna tshogs dag / mi shes chu bos
T02D2591:4b-21: g-yengs shing gsung gi nyid gu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor
T02D2591:4b-22: bral // de phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba 'di //
T02D2591:4b-23: kun du [*kun tu?] rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs kyi spyod yul thun mong ma yin yang //
T02D2591:4b-24: goms pa'i mthu yis mi 'gal tshul du tshad ma dag las rab bsgrubs te //
T02D2591:4b-25: 'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas //
T02D2591:4b-26: skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du yang skad cig tu //
T02D2591:4b-27: mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyi
